title: Cloud Deploy - 設置 Cloud Deploy
abstract:
# Cloud Deploy - 設置 Cloud Deploy
本頁面介紹了設置 Cloud Deploy 的步驟。如需瞭解 Cloud Deploy 的費用，請參閱 [價格](https://cloud.google.com/deploy/pricing?hl=zh-cn) 。
- Titles in dynamic includes are not used anywhere, and we should avoid paying to translate them在 Google Cloud Console 中的項目選擇器頁面上，選擇或 [創建一個 Google Cloud 項目](https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-projects?hl=zh-cn) 。 **注意** ：如果您不打算保留在此過程中創建的資源，請創建新的項目，而不要選擇現有的項目。完成本教程介紹的步驟後，您可以刪除所創建的項目，並移除與該項目關聯的所有資源。 [轉到“項目選擇器”](https://console.cloud.google.com/projectselector2/home/dashboard?hl=zh-cn) 
- Titles in dynamic includes are not used anywhere, and we should avoid paying to translate them [確保您的 Google Cloud 項目已啓用結算功能](https://cloud.google.com/billing/docs/how-to/verify-billing-enabled?hl=zh-cn#console) 。
- Titles in dynamic includes are not used anywhere, and we should avoid paying to translate them啓用 Cloud Deploy API。 [啓用 API](https://console.cloud.google.com/flows/enableapi?apiid=clouddeploy&hl=zh-cn) 您可能需要啓用其他 API（包括 Google Kubernetes Engine、Cloud Storage 和 Cloud Build API）才能使用 Cloud Deploy 功能。如需啓用這些 API，請前往 Google Cloud 控制檯中的 [API 庫](https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/library?hl=zh-cn) ，然後搜索這些 API。
- Titles in dynamic includes are not used anywhere, and we should avoid paying to translate them [安裝](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/install?hl=zh-cn) Google Cloud CLI，然後通過運行以下命令 [初始化](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/initializing?hl=zh-cn) Google Cloud CLI：```
gcloud init
```
- 如果您已安裝 gcloud CLI，請確保已安裝最新可用版本：```
 gcloud components update
```
content:
## 後續步驟

- [部署應用](https://cloud.google.com/deploy/docs/deploying-application?hl=zh-cn)
